appDesc.message: Set "Playing", "Streaming" and "Listening to" in Discord to whatever you want.

troubleshootingRestart.message: If that didn't do it, restart your browser.

hintTwitchOnly.message: The stream link must start with https://twitch.tv/

sourceAutoVideo.message: Your Discord Activity will be the title of the video you're watching or empty if you're not watching a video.

sourceAutoMusic.message: Your Discord Activity will be the name + author of the song you're listening to or empty if you're not listening to a song.

sourceAutoPlex.message: Your Discord Activity will be the name of the episode, movie, or song you're watching or listening to or empty if not applicable.

hintRatelimit.message: Discord only accepts 5 activity changes per minute
